Matt,

Thank you for exploring this before reporting. I was waiting to see =
if someone else jumped in on this because I don't have any experience with =
EJBs.

The behavior you report is certainly not how JUnit is supposed to wo=
rk. @BeforeClass methods are (I thought) guaranteed to be called before any=
 tests in that class are called. Is it possible for you to put logging call=
s in the test itself as well to verify that this invariant is not holding?
=

As far running all the tests in the same context, I'm afraid I can't help =
with that.

Regards,

Kent
